channel.title: antlr on Bodacious Blog
channel.description: Recent content in antlr on Bodacious Blog

item.title: universal file parser in emacs
item.description: Summary I make a way to get a more abstract representation of any buffer in emacs utilising parsers, antlr4 in particular. Demonstration Going from edn to json to json schema All I need to do is press M-& 2 times to do this. The idea is that every time you press M-&, it takes you to a more abstract representation of what you are looking at. -- Using the universal antlr parser Steps Set up antlr Follow the setup instructions.
